Entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 19 10 2 Mando 19 10 1 Grogu 18 10 1/pause 1500/showFrame 5/showFrame Mando 19/positionOffset Mando -30 -30/positionOffset Grogu -20 0/message " ...Riduur?"/pause 1000/message "Kriff!"/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1000/showFrame 4/pause 1000/speak Mando "Mar'e!#$b#You scared me, @."/emote farmer 28/playSound dustMeep/pause 1000/speak Mando "You're safe, cyare.#$b#Come, stand for me."/pause 1000/showFrame Mando 0/pause 200/showFrame 0/pause 800/startJittering/playSound dustMeep/pause 300/stopJittering/positionOffset Mando 0 10/pause 1500/speak Mando "Easy."/pause 1000/viewport 100 100/pause 200/minedeath/end

Entries.85925001/t 600 2000/w sunny/f Mando 500: spring_day_ambient/-100 -100/farmer 23 19 0 Mando 19 14 2 Grogu 18 16 1/skippable/addTemporaryActor Frog 16 16 19 17 1 false Animal frog/showFrame Mando 19/playSound croak/pause 700/viewport 21 16/move frog 4 0 1 true/move Grogu 5 0 1 true/pause 3000/playSound croak/move frog -3 0 3 true/move Grogu -3 0 3 true/pause 3000/playSound croak/move frog 3 0 1 true/move Grogu 3 0 2 true/pause 3000/playSound croak/warp frog -1000 -1000/showFrame Grogu 32/shake Grogu 200/pause 400/playSound gulp/showFrame Grogu 33/shake Grogu 200/pause 500/jump farmer 3/emote farmer 16/pause 200/move Mando 0 3 1 true/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 2300/jump farmer 2/playSound fishSlap/faceDirection frog 1/warp frog 24 16/pause 1000/move Mando 2 0 1 true/move frog 5 0 1 true/move Grogu -1 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 2500/speak Mando "What's wrong, @?"/pause 500/jump farmer 2/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Mando "Poisonous?"/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic desolate/emote Mando 12/shake Mando 300/pause 1000/speak Mando "I... I had no idea."/pause 600/speak Mando "...Kriff."/showFrame Mando 17/pause 150/showFrame Mando 19/pause 1000/move Grogu 0 1 3/move Grogu -1 0 2/jump Grogu 3/pause 200/warp Grogu -100 -100/showFrame Mando 22/pause 1000/shake Mando 300/pause 800/speak Mando "In the past few years I've lost my work, my tribe...#$b#The kid is all I have left now, and I almost..."/pause 500/shake Mando 300/pause 500/speak Mando "I owe you a debt, @."/pause 1000/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 200/positionOffset farmer -15 -15/showFrame 4/pause 2500/showFrame Mando 23/playSound dustMeep/pause 500/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/end dialogue Mando "The kid's ok, right?#$b#I can't imagine if you hadn't been there..."

Entries.85925003/t 2100 2600/w sunny/f Mando 100: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 28 23 3 Mando 16 23 0 Grogu 15 22 2/skippable/changeLocation Custom_Stargaze/animate Grogu true true 400 24 25 26 27/viewport 19 18/pause 2000/textAboveHead Mando "good job <"/pause 2000/move farmer -5 0 3/pause 400/speak Mando "Do you ever feel homesick, @?"/pause 500/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 500/speak Mando "It's been almost 2 years now since the kid and I have been off planet.#$b#It's for his safety, and I'll never regret that but..."/pause 500/speak Mando "I miss flying in my cold, tiny ship.$s#$b#We ate ration bars and were constantly on the run, but it was home.#$b#The town here is great for the kid, but it isn't home."/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 500/faceDirection Mando 1/pause 500/speak Mando "But it has... felt more like home.#$b#Since your arrival.$l#$b#I want you to know that.$l"/move farmer -1 0 0/faceDirection Mando 0/pause 500/speak Mando "I guess home is never a place for Mandalorians. It's friends, family.#$b#And aliit ori'shya tal'din..."/pause 400/shake Mando 200/positionOffset Mando 10 0/pause 1000/shake Mando 200/positionOffset Mando 10 0/pause 1000/speak Mando "@..."/pause 500/jump farmer 1/positionOffset farmer -3 -3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Mando 1/pause 500/emote Mando 40/pause 600/animate Mando true true 100 50/eyes 1 -9000/pause 1000/speak Mando "Vor'e.#$b#Thank you, verd'ika.#$b#For...$l"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "Everything."/pause 100/end

Entries.85925006/t 600 610/f Mando 2000: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 4 3 Mando 18 4 2 Harvey 14 7 3 Maru_Hospital 13 7 1/skippable/changeLocation Hospital/viewport -100 -100/ambientLight 200 200 150/makeInvisible 17 3 5 3/addTemporaryActor Grogu 16 32 -1000 -1000 2 false Character/positionOffset farmer 15 15/positionOffset Grogu 15 -30/animate farmer true true 100 101/animate Mando false true 1000 22/message "You sleep poorly, no amount of blankets enough to keep your body from shivering."/message "You stumble out of bed in the morning and cling to the kitchen counter as your morning coffee brews."/message "When you turn to grab a mug, your knee buckles and everything goes dark."/playSound breakingGlass/pause 400/playSound Ship/pause 3000/playMusic desolate/pause 100/viewport 19 5/pause 5000/playSound dustMeep/stopAnimation Mando 22/animate Mando false true 1000 23/pause 1500/stopAnimation Mando 23/animate Mando false true 100 19/jump Grogu 5/warp Grogu 18 5/pause 900/move Grogu 1 0 1/move Grogu 0 -1 1/pause 2000/playSound dustMeep/jump Grogu 2/pause 900/stopAnimation farmer/pause 200/positionOffset farmer -10 -5/pause 500/speak Grogu "Patu!"/pause 500/stopAnimation Mando 19/animate Mando false false 200 19 18 17 0/pause 800/stopAnimation Mando 0/pause 200/faceDirection Mando 1/pause 1000/speak Mando "@...#$b#You're awake."/pause 500/move Grogu 0 1 2/positionOffset Grogu 0 10/animate Grogu false false 200 20 21 22 23/pause 800/stopAnimation Grogu 23/animate Grogu false true 100 23/positionOffset Grogu 5 0/pause 500/move Mando 1 0 1/positionOffset Mando 0 10/pause 800/speak Mando "I...#$b#We didn't see you today and went to check the farm.#$b#You were on the floor and you weren't moving. I...."/pause 600/speak Mando "You scared me, mesh'la."/pause 600/playSound tinyWhip/jump farmer 1/pause 500/speak Mando "Stay? Us?"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 700/animate Mando true true 100 50/positionOffset Mando 15 0/animate farmer true true 100 101/speak Mando "Very well.#$b#Rest now.$l"/pause 100/stopAnimation Mando/positionOffset Mando -15 0/stopAnimation farmer/pause 700/speak Mando "We'll be here when you wake up to take you home.$h"/pause 1000/animate Mando false true 100 19/positionOffset Mando 0 -15/pause 1000/move Grogu 0 -1 2/jump Grogu 3/pause 50/warp Grogu -1000 -1000/stopAnimation Mando/animate Mando false true 100 23/pause 1500/playSound dustMeep/pause 200/stopAnimation Mando/animate Mando false true 100 22/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 20 0/pause 1000/speak Mando "Don't worry, kid. We'll keep watch."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/pause 200/end dialogue Mando "I'm glad you're feeling better.#$b#Make sure you rest today. You work too hard, mesh'la.#$e#Maybe I should give you a communicator in case you need to reach me."

Entries.85925011/t 2100 2600/w sunny/e 85925006/: spring_night_ambient/-100 -100/farmer 69 10 2 Mando 75 14 2/skippable/addTemporaryActor Tent 48 80 74 12 0 false Character/addTemporaryActor Fire 16 16 75 16 0 false Character/animate Fire false true 200 0 1 2 3 4 5 3/addLantern 932 75 16 2/animate Mando false true 100 19/pause 500/viewport 73 16/move farmer 0 4 1/pause 600/jump Mando 3/stopAnimation Mando 17/showFrame Mando 12/faceDirection Mando 3/pause 1000/speak Mando "@.#$b#I-...#$b#Good evening."/pause 500/jump farmer 2/pause 300/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 500/shake Mando 200/pause 400/speak Mando "Ever since the day we found you unconscious I..."/animate Mando false true 100 51/positionOffset Mando -15 0/pause 300/jump farmer 1/pause 400/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Mando "I can't stop seeing it."/pause 500/stopAnimation Mando 49/pause 500/showFrame Mando 20/shake Mando 200/pause 500/speak Mando "I've been keeping watch for the past week.#$b#I would not enter your farm without permission but I have to... be near."/pause 600/faceDirection Mando 3/pause 500/speak Mando "It's not logical.#$b#But I have to know you are safe... cyar'ika."/pause 1000/positionOffset farmer 10 0/pause 1000/showFrame Mando 50/eyes 1 -5000/pause 1000/speak Mando "Kriff, what have you done to me?"/pause 500/stopAnimation Mando 0/faceDirection Mando 3/pause 500/question fork1 "It's getting colder outside.#Head back to the farm.#Ask to go inside the tent."/fork mandoTent/jump farmer 2/startJittering/pause 300/stopJittering/pause 500/speak Mando "Cold?#$b#Oh yes, you should return home.#$b#I'm going to... stay a bit longer."/pause 500/emote Mando 28/move farmer -4 0 0/pause 400/move farmer 0 -7 0 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Mando "goodnight..."/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/end dialogue Mando "@.#$b#I um... trust you slept well?#$e#I'll try not to sleep outside your farm again."
Entries.mandoTent: jump farmer 2/startJittering/pause 300/stopJittering/pause 500/speak Mando "Cold?#$b#Oh yes, I suppose the tent is warm.#$b#Oh!"/pause 500/jump farmer 2/pause 600/move Mando 1 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 15 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 76 13/playSound tinyWhip/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/positionOffset farmer -15 0/pause 800/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound rabbit/warp farmer -200 -200/pause 600/emote Mando 28/shake Mando 500/pause 1000/move Mando -3 0 1/move Mando 3 0 3/pause 400/shake Mando 200/pause 500/move Mando -1 0 0/move Mando 0 -1 0/warp Mando -200 -200/playSound rabbit/pause 50/showFrame Mando 32/warp Mando 76 13 0/pause 1500/playSound shwip/pause 1500/playSound slime/specificTemporarySprite heart 76 12/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/playSound slime/pause 500/playSound slime/pause 800/playSound slime/pause 1400/playSound yoba/pause 2000/speak Mando "Go back to bed, cyar'ika.#$b#You work too hard, you can't sleep on the ground."/pause 600/playSound shwip/pause 400/playSound rabbit/faceDirection farmer 2/warp farmer 75 14/pause 1000/viewport 73 16/pause 1000/playSound discoverMineral/specificTemporarySprite heart 75 13/eyes 1 -1000/startJittering/pause 200/stopJittering/pause 2000/move farmer -5 0 0/textAboveHead Mando "oh <"/move farmer 0 -10 0/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/end dialogue Mando "@!#$b#I um... trust you slept well?#$e#Cyar'ika? Oh, it's um...#$b#Like a nickname."

Entries.85925000/O Mando: Cloth/31 5/farmer 33 5 3 Mando 31 5 1 Grogu 31 6 0 Din -1000 -1000 2/skippable/positionOffset Grogu 35 -10/pause 500/speak Mando "@...#$b#Mandalorians have no ceremony to bind in marriage.#$b#The first marriage was begun in the midst of battle, with no time for flowers or poems.#$b#But there is a vow...$l#$b#If you would take it with me.$l"/pause 300/jump farmer 1/textAboveHead Mando "<"/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 300/shake Mando 300/pause 600/speak Mando "Mhi solus tome..."/message "We are one when together..."/speak Mando "Mhi solus dar'tome..."/message "We are one when parted..."/speak Mando "Mhi me'dinui an..."/message "We will share all..."/speak Mando "Mhi ba'juri verde."/message "We will raise warriors."/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Mando "@... Riduur...#$b#Ni kar'tayl gar darasuum.#$b#I love you.#$b#And now that we are one... I can do this."/pause 1000/showFrame Mando 16/pause 600/playSound openBox/pause 300/playSound rabbit/pause 400/warp Din 31 5/warp Mando -1000 -1000/pause 500/playMusic winter2/jump farmer 2/pause 800/faceDirection Din 1/shake Din 300/emote Din 28/pause 1000/speak Din "Hi...#$b#Din.#$b#My name... it's Din Djarin.$l"/pause 900/animate Din false true 120 28/positionOffset Din 10 2/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset farmer -10 0/textAboveHead Din "<"/pause 1000/speak Din "Cyar'ika...$h"/pause 400/shake Din 500/pause 400/textAboveHead Grogu "Buir!"/jump Grogu 2/friendship Grogu 2500/playSound dustMeep/pause 1400/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/pause 500/end dialogue Mando "It might take me a bit to get used to going without the helmet around you.#$b#Be patient with me?$l#$e#Riduur... I can't stop saying it.$h"
